header.title: Amathuluzi eSalathiso e-OHS
sidebar.step_0.title: ðŸ“œ Wamukelekile KumaThuluzi eSalathiso e-OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Bheka amathuluzi ethu aphelele kanye nezinsiza zokuthuthukisa ukuphepha kwezempilo endaweni yakho yomsebenzi.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: âš¡ Ngabe uyazi ukuthi ukusebenzisa abaphakeli abanokuziphatha okuhle kunganciphisa izingozi endaweni yomsebenzi ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi wenziwa ngesikhathi kanye ngezindlela eziphezulu zokuphepha?
intro.title: Wamukelekile KumaThuluzi eSalathiso e-OHS
intro.description: Bheka amathuluzi ethu aphelele kanye nezinsiza zokuthuthukisa ukuphepha kwezempilo endaweni yakho yomsebenzi.
legal_obligations.client.title: Izibopho Zomthengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Construction Regulation 5(1)(a): Lungiselela Ukuhlola Ingozi Okusisisekelo (BRA) ekhombisa izingozi zephrojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Construction Regulation 5(1)(b): Nikeza Ulwazi Lwezempilo Nokuphepha oluchaza izidingo eziqondile zephrojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Construction Regulation 5(1)(l): Yamukela Ipholisi Yezempilo Nokuphepha Yomthengi ngaphambi kokuthi umsebenzi uqale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Izibopho Zosonkontileka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Construction Regulation 7(1)(a): Thumela Ipholisi Yezempilo Nokuphepha esekelwe olwazini lomthengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Construction Regulation 7(1)(b): Gcina Ifayela Yezempilo Nokuphepha esayithini elinazo zonke izincwadi ezidingekayo.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Construction Regulation 9: Yenza Ukuhlola Ingozi kanye Nokuhlola Ingozi (HIRA) okuqondile emsebenzini.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Izibopho Zochwepheshe be-H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Construction Regulation 5(5): Ama-ejenti (PrCHSA) aphetha i-H&S egameni lomthengi, aqinisekise ukulandelwa komthetho.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Construction Regulation 8(5): Ama-ofisa (CHSO) asiza abaphakeli ekusebenziseni nasekuhloleni izinhlelo ze-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Izinhlinzeko ze-SACPCMP: Kufanele igcine ukubhalisa kanye nezidingo ze-CPD zezinga lochwepheshe.
wizard.step_0: Sicela ukhethe isenzo ukuze uqale inqubo.
wizard.step_1.title: Isinyathelo 1 kwezi-9: Ufuna Ukwenzani?
wizard.step_1.label: Khetha Amadokhumenti OzoWahlukana (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
wizard.step_1.error: Sicela ukhethe okungenani idokhumenti eyodwa yokuhlanganisa.
wizard.step_2.title: Isinyathelo 2 kwezi-9: Imininingwane Yomthengi
wizard.step_2.client_contact_role_error: Sicela ufake isikhundla somuntu wokuxhumana womthengi.
wizard.step_3.title: Isinyathelo 3 kwezi-9: Ingabe Ukhona Osonkontileka Oqokiwe?
wizard.step_4.title: Isinyathelo 4 kwezi-9: Imininingwane Yosonkontileka
wizard.step_4.contractor_contact_role_er: Sicela ufake isikhundla somuntu wokuxhumana wosonkontileka.
wizard.step_5.title: Isinyathelo 5 kwezi-9: Imininingwane Yephrojekthi
wizard.step_6.title: Isinyathelo 6 kwezi-9: Ubukhulu Bephrojekthi

wizard.step_8.title: Isinyathelo 8 kwezi-9: Ihlanganiselwe
wizard.step_8.specify_error: Sicela uchaze ukuthi idokhumenti yahlukaniselwe bani.
wizard.step_9.title: Isinyathelo 9 kwezi-9: Hlola futhi Ufaka Esikhwameni
wizard.step_9.description: Hlola izinketho zakho bese ufake amadokhumenti esikhwameni sakho ukuze uqhubeke.
cart.title: Isikhwama Sakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo Yesethenjwa Se-Invoice: (Isebenza izinsuku eziyi-7. Bhalisa ukuze ugcine unomphela!)
resources.title: Xhumana Nochwepheshe Be-H&S Abavunyelwe
resources.description: Ngabe udinga usizo lochwepheshe? Xhumana nochwepheshe abavunyelwe ngezidingo zephrojekthi yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, I-Ejenti ye-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo Yokubhalisa: PR12345 - Ukuxhumana: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Isikhulu se-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Inombolo Yokubhalisa: CHSO67890 - Ukuxhumana: john.smith@example.com

footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Unolwazi
chatbot.response: Ngilapha ukukusiza! Ukuze uthole izeluleko ze-OHS eziqondile, sicela uxhumane nochwepheshe.
training.title: Ukuqeqesha Okuphelele Kwendawo Yomsebenzi
training.description: Bheka izinhlelo zethu zokuqeqesha endaweni yomsebenzi eziphelele ukuze uqinisekise ukulandelwa kwemithetho ye-OHS yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye nokukhuthaza indawo yomsebenzi ephephile. Khetha ukuqeqesha okusebenzisa izandla, ukuqeqesha kweqembu, noma usebenzise i-wizard yethu ukuze uthole izincomo eziqondile ezisekelwe embonini yakho, abantu abalindelwe, kanye nendawo.
training.wizard.start: Sicela ukhethe ukhetho ukuze uqale inqubo yesincomo sokuqeqesha.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Isinyathelo 1 kwezi-5: Khetha Umboni Wakho
training.wizard.step_1.label: Umboni:
training.wizard.step_2.title: Isinyathelo 2 kwezi-5: Khetha Abantu Abalindelwe
training.wizard.step_2.label: Abantu Abalindelwe (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
training.wizard.step_2.error: Sicela ukhethe okungenani abantu abalindelwe abanye.
training.wizard.step_2.option_emergency_: Iqembu Lezimo Eziphuthumayo (Abanikezeli Bosizo Lokuqala, Abacishimlilo)
training.wizard.step_3.title: Isinyathelo 3 kwezi-5: Chaza Indawo Yakho
training.wizard.step_4.title: Isinyathelo 4 kwezi-5: Imininingwane Eyengeziwe
training.wizard.step_5.title: Isinyathelo 5 kwezi-5: Hlola Ukuqeqesha Okunconyiwe
training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe kulwazi olunikile, lezi yizinhlelo zokuqeqesha ezinconyiwe. Khetha lezo ofuna ukuzifaka esikhwameni sakho.
training.cart.title: Isikhwama Sakho Sokuqeqesha
training.cart.customization.title: Shintsha Amathuluzi Akho Okuqeqesha
training.cart.customization.first_aider_: Sicela ufake igama lomnikezeli wosizo lokuqala.
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Sicela ufake inombolo yokuxhumana yezimo eziphuthumayo esebenzayo (isb., +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Ihlanganiswe Ngu
training.cart.training_type.title: Indlela Yokuqeqesha
training.cart.training_type.label: Khetha Indlela Yokunikezela:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Isaziso se-SafetyHelp: Amathuluzi okuqeqesha anikeziwe awenzelwe ukunikeza ulwazi kuphela futhi awameleli izeluleko zochwepheshe. Ukuze uthole izixazululo ze-OHS eziqondile, sicela uxhumane ne-SafetyHelp ku support@safetyhelp.co.za noma uvakashele Ikhasi Lokuxhumana.
training.checkout.success: Ukukhokha kuphumelele! Amathuluzi akho okuqeqesha ahlanganisiwe. Laoda ama-PDF akho ngezansi. Ukuze uthole ukuqeqesha ku-inthanethi, amakhodi okungena athunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyili.
training.providers.title: Abaphakeli Bokuqeqesha Abavunyelwe
training.providers.description: Ngabe udinga ukuqeqesha komuntu oyedwa? Xhumana nabaphakeli bokuqeqesha abavunyelwe ngezidingo zakho.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - Ivunyelwe Yi-SETA - Iqondiswe Osizweni Lokuqala, Ukucisha Umlilo - Ukuxhumana: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - Ibhaliswe Ku-SACPCMP - Iqondiswe Ekuphepheni Kokwakha - Ukuxhumana: training@safeskills.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Thenga Imanuwali Yokuqeqesha Engafakwa
training.manual.purchase.description: Thola imanuwali yokuqeqesha ephelele ehlanganiselwe inkampani yakho, ehlanganisa izidingo zomthetho, okuqukethwe okukhethekile kwenkampani okusekelwe kuphrofayili yakho yengozi, kanye nezilinganiso ezivela kubaphakeli bokuqeqesha abavunyelwe.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Chaza Iphrofayili Yengozi Yemanuwali Yokuqeqesha Yakho
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Iphrofayili Yengozi:
training.selection_method.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho Yokuqeqesha
training.legal_fact.step_1: Iqiniso Lomthetho: Umthetho we-OHS Isigaba 8 ufuna ukuthi abaqashi banikeze ukuqeqesha okuqondile ngezingozi eziqondile zendawo yomsebenzi.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Iqiniso Elimnandi: Ngabe uyazi ukuthi ukuqeqesha okuvamile kunganciphisa izehlakalo zendawo yomsebenzi zifike ku-30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Iqiniso Lomthetho: Omkhandlu bendawo bangaba nemithetho ye-OHS ehlukile ehlangana nezidingo zokuqeqesha.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Iqiniso Elimnandi: Izindawo zokusebenza ezinengozi ephezulu njengamasayithi okwakha zidinga ukuqeqesha okuvamile ukuze kugcinwe izinga lokuphepha.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Iqiniso Lomthetho: Umthetho we-OHS ufuna ukuqeqesha okuqondile kwezindima ezifana nabameleli be-SHE ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukulandelwa komthetho.
legislation.title: Umthetho we-OHS kanye Nokuphatha Ingozi
legislation.description: Yenza umthetho we-OHS kanye nepholisi yokuphatha ingozi ehlanganiselwe ibhizinisi lakho. Faka imininingwane yenkampani yakho, imisebenzi, kanye nezingozi ukuze uthole umbiko ophelele wokulandelwa ofaka umthetho waseNingizimu Afrika, imithetho yomasipala, kanye namazinga omhlaba.
legislation.wizard.title: Yenza I-RMP Yakho
legislation.wizard.step_1.title: Isinyathelo 1 kwezi-4: Imininingwane Yenkampani
legislation.wizard.step_2.title: Isinyathelo 2 kwezi-4: Imisebenzi
legislation.wizard.step_2.label: Khetha Imisebenzi (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
legislation.wizard.step_3.title: Isinyathelo 3 kwezi-4: Izingozi
legislation.wizard.step_3.label: Khetha Izingozi (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
legislation.wizard.step_4.title: Isinyathelo 4 kwezi-4: Hlola futhi Wenze
legislation.wizard.step_4.description: Hlola ulwazi olunikile futhi wenze i-RMP yakho. Ungafaka umthetho owengeziwe uma kudingekile.
legislation.cart.title: Ukukhokha
legislation.cart.description: I-RMP yakho ihlanganisiwe! Sebenzisa ikhodi yevawutsha FREERMP2025 ukuze ulaode mahala (abantu bokuqala abayi-100).
suppliers.title: Uhlu Lwabaphakeli be-OHS
suppliers.description: Thola futhi uqoke abaphakeli be-OHS eNingizimu Afrika. Cinga ngendawo, izinsiza, kanye nezitifiketi. Thumela izibuyekezo ukuze usize abanye benze izinqumo ezinolwazi.
suppliers.list.title: Uhlu Lwabaphakeli
suppliers.table.name: Igama Lomphakeli
suppliers.review_form.title: Thumela Isibuyekezo
community_tools.title: Amathuluzi Okuphepha Komphakathi
community_tools.description: Bika noma yisiphi isehlakalo sokuphepha noma ingozi emphakathini wakho noma endaweni yakho yomsebenzi, kusukela emigodini kuya ezintweni ezingasebenzi kahle. Sebenzisa amathuluzi ethu ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha ezindaweni ezifana nezitolo ze-spaza, izikole, izibhedlela, kanye nezindawo zokudlela.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Bika Isehlakalo noma Ingozi
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Chaza isehlakalo noma ingozi (isb., umgodi ku-Main Street, isihlalo esiphukile esikhungweni somphakathi)...
community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: I-Handle Yakho Ye-Social Media (Ngokuzikhethela, isb., @username ku-X):
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Faka ucingo noma i-imeyili (izogcwalwa ngokuzenzakalelayo uma umphakeli ekhethiwe)...
I-Handle Ye-Social Media Yomphakeli Wensiza (Ngokuzikhethela, isb., @CityofJoburgZA ku-X):
Faka i-handle ye-X (izogcwalwa ngokuzenzakalelayo uma umphakeli ekhethiwe)...
community_tools.list.title: Amanye Amathuluzi Okuphepha Komphakathi
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Uhlu Lokuphepha Lwesitolo Se-Spaza
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Qinisekisa ukuthi isitolo sakho se-spaza siyahlangabezana nezidingo zokuphepha komlilo, kagesi, kanye nesakhiwo ngokwemigomo yomasipala kanye nomthetho we-OHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Isiqondiso Sokuphepha Komlilo Wesikole
community_tools.list.school.description: Funda izidingo zomthetho zokuphepha komlilo ezikoleni, okuhlanganisa izinhlelo zokuphuma kanye nezinsiza.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Isiqondiso Sokulungiselela Izimo Eziphuthumayo Zesibhedlela
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Qinisekisa ukuthi izibhedlela zilungiselele izimo eziphuthumayo ngezinhlelo zokuphuma ezifanele kanye nezinsiza zokuphepha.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Uhlu Lokuphepha Lwetavern
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Hlola ukuthi izindawo zokudlela ziyalandela imithetho yokuphepha komlilo kanye nokuphatha abantu ukuze kuvinjelwe izehlakalo.
dashboard.title: Ideshibhodi Yelungu
dashboard.welcome: Wamukelekile, [Igama Lomsebenzi]! Phatha ukulandelwa kwakho kwe-OHS, ama-RMP, izibuyekezo zabaphakeli, kanye nemibiko yomphakathi lapha.
dashboard.profile.title: Iphrofayili Yenkampani
dashboard.rmps.title: Ama-RMP Agciniwe
dashboard.supplier_reviews.title: Izibuyekezo Zabaphakeli
dashboard.incident_reports.title: Imibiko Yezehlakalo
document_categories.title: Hlanganisa Amadokhumenti Ohlelweni Lwakho Lokuphatha I-OHS
document_categories.description: Khetha futhi uhlanganise amadokhumenti ozodinga ohlelweni lwakho lokuphatha i-OHS. Khetha kwezinqubomgomo, izinqubo, izinga, nokunye, okuhlanganiselwe izidingo zomkhakha wakho.
document_categories.policies.title: Izinqubomgomo
document_categories.policies.description: Izitatimende zezinga eliphezulu zemigomo kanye nezibopho, ezivunyelwe ngabaphathi abaphezulu.
document_categories.policies.infectious_: Inqubomgomo Yokuphendula Ku-COVID-19 noma Izifo Ezithathelanayo
document_categories.policies.ohs_audit_i: Inqubomgomo Yokuhlolwa kanye Nokuhlola Izimali Ye-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_perform: Inqubomgomo Yokusebenza, Ukubuyekezwa, kanye Nezinjongo Ze-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_communi: Inqubomgomo Yokuxhumana, Ukubamba Iqhaza, kanye Nokubonisana Ye-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_workpla: Inqubomgomo Yezempilo kanye Nenhlalakahle Emsebenzini Ye-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_documen: Inqubomgomo Yokuphatha Amadokhumenti kanye Namarekhodi Ye-OHS
document_categories.procedures.title: Izinqubo
document_categories.procedures.descripti: Iziqondiso zesinyathelo ngesinyathelo zokwenza imisebenzi ngokuphephile nangokungaguquki.
document_categories.procedures.hira_proc: Inqubo Yokuhlola Ingozi kanye Nokuhlola Ingozi (HIRA)
document_categories.procedures.first_aid: Inqubo Yosizo Lokuqala kanye Nezimo Eziphuthumayo Zezempilo
document_categories.standards.title: Amaleveli/Izinhlinzeko
document_categories.standards.descriptio: Amaleveli angaphakathi afana nomthetho noma amaleveli embonini, achaza izimo ezilindelekile noma ukuziphatha.
document_categories.standards.emergency_: Amaleveli Okulungiselela Izimo Eziphuthumayo kanye Nokuphendula
document_categories.standards.noise_vent: Amaleveli Omsindo, Ukungenisa Umoya, kanye Nokukhanyisa
document_categories.standards.hygiene_fa: Amaleveli Endawo Yenhlanzeko (izindlu zangasese, amanzi, izindawo zokuphumula)
document_categories.standards.ohs_perfor: Amaleveli Okusebenza, Ukubuyekezwa, kanye Nezinjongo Ze-OHS

document_categories.standards.ohs_docume: Amaleveli Okuphatha Amadokhumenti kanye Namarekhodi Ye-OHS
document_categories.registers_logs.title: Amarejista kanye Namarekhodi

document_categories.registers_logs.title.document_categories.registers_logs.descr: Amarekhodi abuyekezwa njalo ukuze kusekelwe ukulandelwa kanye nokulandelelwa.
document_categories.registers_logs.title.document_categories.templates_forms.desc: Amadokhumenti ahlanganiswe kusengaphambili ukuze aqoqe futhi ahlanganise ulwazi.
document_categories.registers_logs.title.document_categories.templates_forms.fit_: Iforomu Yokuba Ngokulungele Umsebenzi / Iforomu Yokuhlolwa Kokubuyela Emsebenzini

document_categories.registers_logs.title.document_categories.permits.description: Izimvume ezilawulwayo zemisebenzi enengozi ephezulu noma evinjelwe.

document_categories.registers_logs.title.document_categories.records.description: Amadokhumenti aphethiweyo akhombisa ukusebenza kanye nokulandela umthetho.
